verses.name: Jeremiah 42:12
verses.text: And I will shew mercies unto you, that he may have mercy upon you, and cause you to return to your own land.

verses.name: Jeremiah 42:13
verses.text: But if ye say, We will not dwell in this land, neither obey the voice of the Lord your God,

verses.name: Jeremiah 42:14
verses.text: Saying, No; but we will go into the land of Egypt, where we shall see no war, nor hear the sound of the trumpet, nor have hunger of bread; and there will we dwell:
